0P0000KOB1.F.short_name: Salar Fund Plc Class A1 EUR
0P0000KOB1.F.long_name: Salar Fund Plc Class A1 EUR
0P0000KOB1.F.summary: The Fundâs investment objective is to generate capital growth, whilst seeking to preserve capital, through a variety of risk/reward strategies generally in the convertible bond markets. The Fund targets absolute returns and aims to achieve returns which exceed the Benchmark Return. There can be no assurance that the Fund will achieve its investment objective.
0P0000KOB1.F.manager_bio: Rupert Mathews is a co-founder of Ferox Capital and has 12 years experience in convertibles trading. He graduated from Bristol University in 1993 and joined JP Morgan in London in the Equity Derivatives division. In 1996 he joined the convertible bond team headed by Jeremy Herrmann, focussing on proprietary trading. He left to start up the Investment Manager in June 2000.
